intro: This Product User Manual provides comprehensive mapping guidance for service providers involved in the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas project. It details the specifications and methodologies required to generate standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps for Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) across Europe, the EFTA countries, the Western Balkans, the UK, and Turkey. With a particular focus on updates for the 2012 and 2018 reference years, this manual aims to ensure congruent product attributes, a common nomenclature, a consistent look and feel, and comparable product quality across the Urban Atlas dataset.
